title: Joe Biden, a President for the New Cold War
sub_head: In one way, the 79-year-old NATO adherent is the right man for his times.
body:
I’ve been waiting for some fragment of vindication after suggesting in 2019 that Joe Biden might be the “best we can do” in 2020.
The occasion was the first Donald Trump impeachment, over his Ukraine phone call. More than a few Democrats, supporters of Elizabeth Warren or Bernie Sanders, saw a twofer since the case also exposed the dealings of Mr. Biden’s son with a Ukrainian oligarch company, opening the door to further exploration of Biden family buckraking.
